Summary Note:
The RM met Alina Diana Bauer at a yacht party in Berlin. They enjoyed a scenic cruise and discussed various investment strategies, which marked the beginning of a successful partnership.
Alina Diana Bauer is a 36 year old Clinical Trials Manager from Germany.
Julius Baer's exceptional client service and bespoke financial solutions were the main reasons she decided to join.
Family Background: Alina Diana Bauer is currently divorced. She has 1 kid called Schultz.
Education Background:
Alina completed her secondary education at Heinrich-Hertz-Gymnasium in 2007.
Alina pursued higher education at Ludwig Maximilian University of Munich, graduating in 2013.
Occupation History:
Alina Diana Bauer is a 36 year old Clinical Trials Manager from Germany. She has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Alina Diana Bauer began her professional journey as a Research Scientist at Bayer AG in 2013, laying the foundation for future success.
At Bayer AG, she held the position of Clinical Trials Manager from 2016 till now, making significant contributions to the organization.
Wealth Summary:
She managed to save approximately 100000 EUR from her earnings at all companies.
She has townhouse located in Nuremberg, worth 1288000 EUR.

In addition to her primary residence, she owns flat in Heidelberg worth 1200000 EUR.

Moreover, she has invested in additional property in Hanover, giving possiblity for generating additional income. The villa is valued at 2900000 EUR.

She inherited 2920000 EUR from her grandmother, a well-known Investment Banker, in 2018, allowing her to expand her investment portfolio.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Alina as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
